title: Solaris 8 Operating System for IA (x86) (bootable installation)
description:
!!! Solaris 8 2/00 Operating System, x86 Platform Edition now completely bootable! Search at the http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4514982 !!!

Solaris 8 Operating System for IA (x86) (bootable installation pack)
"Solaris8x86_v1+v2+DCA"

0. Extract zip-archives to anyplace you want.
1. Copy floppy image S8_1001.3 to really floppy-diskette
2. Burn each CD-image on a separate CD-R
3. Boot from floppy in DCA and then select CD-ROM as boot device
4. Continue installing...

PS Thanks tj8 for this "http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4358558/Sun_Solaris_8_intel_x86-32_edition_02_00" torrent.
I`ve recompiled the 1-st CD from that torrent.

Solaris 8 x86 was installed successfully from these iso(s) on VMware-server-2.0.0-116503
Actually you need 1-st CD-image and DCA floppy image for basic installation!


PLEASE SEEDING!!! MY SPEED SO SLOW 25-30kb/s


Have fun!!!
